product_name: Gregory Tempo Handheld Water Bottle - 2014 Closeout
long_description: This handheld water bottle is the ideal grab-and-go hydrator for your daily run. Its design reduces grip fatigue while simultaneously providing space for small items like car keys, ID or energy gels.
short_description: This handheld water bottle is the ideal grab-and-go hydrator for your daily run. Its design reduces grip fatigue while simultaneously providing space for small items like car keys, ID or energy gels.
